channel.title: 数字花园
channel.description: 最近的10条笔记 on 数字花园

item.title: EE
item.description: 00-电子基础 《电路·邱关源》 01-C语言 《C程序设计语言(K&R)清晰中文版》 《C_Primer_Plus_第五版》 02-数据结构与算法 03-计算机组成原理 04-处理器架构 05-操作系统 06-计算机网络 07-常用芯片手册 08-测试 09-程序员修养 10-数学 11-设计模式 12-面向对象 13-CPP .

item.title: ARM
item.description: Internationalization allows users to translate text in the Quartz interface into various supported languages without needing to make extensive code changes.

item.title: Linux
item.description: Quartz uses Katex by default to typeset both inline and block math expressions at build time.

item.title: MCU
item.description: org-roam is a plain-text personal knowledge management system for emacs.

item.title: STM32
item.description: Syntax highlighting in Quartz is completely done at build-time.

item.title: 工业互联网
item.description: Quartz was originally designed as a tool to publish Obsidian vaults as websites.

item.title: 工具
item.description: Full-text search in Quartz is powered by Flexsearch.

item.title: 操作系统
item.description: Quartz uses rehype-citation to support parsing of a BibTex bibliography file.

item.title: 数字电路
item.description: Reader Mode is a feature that allows users to focus on the content by hiding the sidebars and other UI elements.

item.title: 数学
item.description: Quartz features an explorer that allows you to navigate all files and folders on your site. It supports nested folders and is highly customizable.
